column1: Who cares if I'm pretty if I fail my finals? - Rory Gilmore
Does anybody know how to study? - Jeff Winger
I can't I have to study. - Rory Gilmore
I checked this out weeks ago for a bit of light reading. - Hermione Granger
The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem. - Captain Jack Sparrow
WE WERE ON A BREAK! - Ross Geller
I didn't cheat. I studied for two weeks and I passed. - Frank Abagnale
In a few years I hopte to have some more friends and not have time for this kind of stuff. - Alex Dunphy
Don't you think that if I were wrong I'd know it? - Sheldon Cooper
That's what I do. I drink and I know things. - Tyrion Lannister
You know nothing Jon Snow - Ygritte
PATIENCE YOU MUST HAVE my young padawan. - Yoda
All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us. - Gandalf
The greatest power on Earth is the magnificent power all of us possess … the power of the human brain! - Charles Xavier
I'm not great at the advice. Can I interest you in a sarcastic comment? - Chandler Bing
